name: holding
desc: true if the arm ?a is holding the block ?b
raw: (holding ?a - arm ?b - block): true if the arm ?a is holding the block ?b
clean: (holding ?a - arm ?b - block): true if the arm ?a is holding the block ?b

name: clear
desc: true if the block ?b is clear (not covered by another block)
raw: (clear ?b - block): true if the block ?b is clear (not covered by another block)
clean: (clear ?b - block): true if the block ?b is clear (not covered by another block)

name: on_top
desc: true if the block ?b1 is on top of the block ?b2
raw: (on_top ?b1 - block ?b2 - block): true if the block ?b1 is on top of the block ?b
clean: (on_top ?b1 - block ?b2 - block): true if the block ?b1 is on top of the block ?b2

name: on_table
desc: true if the block ?b is on the table
raw: (on_table ?b - block): true if the block ?b is on the table
clean: (on_table ?b - block): true if the block ?b is on the table
